string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.value: 맨날 똑같은 데만 있지 말고 좀 돌아다녀 보는건 어때? 아웅?

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 졸려 죽겠는데 자꾸 말 시키고 그러네... 아웅...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 에이... 말 시키지 말고 밥이나 주지... 아웅...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 아이 참... 또 말하라는 거야? 싫은데~ 아웅...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 우리 펫들은 헤네시스의 클로이라는 사람이 만들었대요. 아웅~

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: 주인님... 머리 너무 큰거 아니에요? 아우웅~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: 주인님 애인 있어요? 난 없는데... 아웅...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 주인님 어째 요즘 배가 나온것 같은데요? 히히...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 오늘의 메뉴는 뭐에요? 기왕이면 맛있는 걸로 부탁해요~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: 아깝더라도 물약을 팍팍 먹어가며 싸워야 빨리 강해질 수 있다구요~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: 가끔은 배를 타고 다른 곳으로 놀러가 봤으면 좋겠어요.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 주인님 다른 재미있는거 하고 놀아요~ 아웅~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 여기 너무 지저분해서 앉을수가 없다구요~ 아웅~

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: 아까 놀았는데 뭘 또 놀자고 난리야...

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: 주인님 제가 뭐하고 놀지 생각해 놨어요~

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: 자는 동안 혼자 맛있는 거 먹으면 안돼요... 아웅...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 주인님... 아직도 앉는거 시키는 거에요? 너무 쉽다구요.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 앉아 있는건지 엎드린 건지 구분이 안가죠? 히히...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 응? 잠깐 딴생각 하고 있었어~ 아웅~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 주인님 다른 재미있는거 하고 놀아요~ 아웅~

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 여기 너무 지저분해서 쉴수가 없다구요~ 아웅~

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 요즘 살이 쪄서 쉬면 안돼요~ 아웅~

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 아~ 너무 뛰어다녔더니 다리가 아프네~ 아웅~

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 제 뱃살 보이시죠? 쉬고 있으면 안된다구요~

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 역시 주인님은 제 맘을 너무 잘 안다니까요~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 이렇게 쉬고 있는 시간이 제일 좋아요~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 아무리 저라도 더 이상은 무리에요... 아웅...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 안 마려운데 어떻게 응가를 해... 크앙...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 사람들도 많은데 어떻게 응가를 해... 크앙...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 주인님... 응가한지 얼마 안 지났어요... 크앙...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 끄으응... 오늘은 응가 모양이 너무 이쁘다~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 아 시원하다~ 앗! 주인님... 응가 밟았어요...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 아이 시원하다~ 그래도 응가하는 건 챙피해...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 응차~ 주인님, 제 응가는 절 닮아서 너무 너무 귀엽죠?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 쟤 또 맘에도 없는 소리 하네...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 주인님이 하라는 거라면 뭐든지 할거에요~ 크앙~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 주인님, 이렇게 하면 되는 건가요? 크앙~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 응? 잠깐 딴 생각 하고 있었어~ 크앙~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 이렇게요? 에이... 한 번은 시키는대로 해준다...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 그 말 취소하세요! 취소! 취소! 크앙!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 주... 주인님 너무하세요... 그렇게 심한 말을... 크앙...

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 주인님 저는 그런 말에 상처받아요... 크앙...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 주인님이 그런 말을 하시다니 믿을 수 없어요!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 주인님... 처음 듣는 말은 아니지만 들을 때마다 울고 싶어 진다구요...

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: 내가 말 하라면 할줄 알고? 크앙~

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: 열심히 사냥하다 보면 좋은 아이템도 나오고 그러는 법이야. 크앙~

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 취미가 뭐야? 나랑 같이 할 수 있는거 였으면 좋겠다~ 크앙~

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 나... 배고프면 집으로 들어가 버릴지도 모르니까 너무 굶기진 말아줘... 크앙...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 더 이상 무슨 말을 하라고... 크앙...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 할 말도 없는데 자꾸 말시키네~ 크앙~

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 왠지 오늘은 좋은 아이템이 떨어질 것만 같아요. 크앙~

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: 주인님, 오늘도 맛있는 밥 많이 주실꺼죠? 크앙~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 오늘 기분은 어떠세요? 좋죠? 그렇죠? 크앙~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: 이 곳에는 사람들이 아주 많으니까 다른 사람들을 배려하는거 잊지 마세요. 크앙~

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 되게 귀찮게 하네... 할 말 없다니까...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 아이 참... 또 말하라는 거야? 싫은데~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: 졸려 죽겠는데 자꾸 말 시키고 난리야~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: 주인님, 어째 요즘 배가 나온것 같은데요? 히히...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: 내가 하라는대로 다 할 줄 아나봐... 크앙...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 끄윽~ 어때? 나 트림하는거 예쁘지? 크앙~

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: 친구들이 난 트림할때가 제일 예쁘데. 크앙~

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: 밥을 줘야 이쁜짓을 하든 말든... 크앙...

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: 이렇게 귀여운 트림은 아무도 못할껄요? 크앙~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 주인님 다른 재미있는거 하고 놀아요~ 크앙~

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: 설마 제가 순순히 할 거라고 생각하신건 아니겠죠?

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: 먹은게 있어야 트림을 하죠... 주인님 바보...?

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: 오늘 마늘을 먹어서 차마 트림을 못하겠어요.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: 후후... 이 정도면 반하지 않을 수 없겠죠? 끄윽~

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: 주인님을 향한 제 마음의 트림을 받으세요~!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: 자는 동안 얼굴에 낙서해 놓을 거면서!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: 저 자는동안 혼자 맛있는거 먹으면 안돼요... 크앙...

string.value: 한 번 쯤은 하라는 데로 해줘야 겠다...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 자~ 이제 주인님도 앉아서 같이 쉬세요~

string.value: 맨날 혼나다 보니 이젠 아무렇지도 않아요.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that, ru!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, ru.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Master, I can't believe you said that. Ru!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Please tell me you didn't mean it, ru?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Hey, I still think you're a good person.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, ru!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um.I don't want to do something boring like that. Ru.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it, ru!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to, then RU!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Hey, I'm much taller now! Ru!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to do the same thing?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I can't hear you. I can't hear you

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I must be REALLY good, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You won't find a reindeer that can stand like I do

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: The view is amazing from up here.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Still a long way from coming out.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You expect me to poop in public?? Ru!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few minutes ago, ru.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Master, the poop isn't coming out, ru!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: That's it! I'm calling my lawyer, ru.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I can't poop on an empty stomach, ru.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Master, pooping in public is SO uncool, ru.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Wanna light it on fire? Ru!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh! Oops, I almost stepped on it, ru!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The same thing over and over. how boring. Ru~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sorry. I wasn't paying attention. Ru .

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Sitting makes me tired, but. Ru ~~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: This looks like a nice spot. Ru ~~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: You want me to sit here, right? Ru ~~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: You are pretty sick. You know that?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh, please don't look. It's embarassing.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Wow. That's a really healthy color.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Let's leave it for someone to step on.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You ever heard of a talking Rudolph? Me neither, ru.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things, ru!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Ru.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm not in a good mood. Ru.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Something wrong? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, ru.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Make sure you don’t get ripped off when buying off other users, alright?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: If you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say, ru.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, don't talk to me, ru!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Will you show me the world? Ru!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Isn't it boring playing by yourself? I like hanging out with others. Ru.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Be nice to everyone around you, because people talk!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I heard there's this place called Happyville. Have you? Ru.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but feed me!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You are a little too old for hugs. Don’t you think?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What's the matter? Did you not get enough attention as a child?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: We are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Wow you have a huge head!!!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I bet I can drink potions faster than you can~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen to you!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Who were you talking to? Ru?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don't think you mean it, ru!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! Ru!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: One minute you don’t like me, and now you like me. What is that?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Feed me if you really love me!!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I bet you say that to all the reindeer.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Please tell me that more often!!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: No, I don’t want to do it, ru!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't YOU do it, ru!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood, ru!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Hey what do you think? Good, right? Ru?

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You have to admit, this is cute. Ru!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Hey, this is the way to do it, right ru?

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: You like it? Yeah I know, ru!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Ru!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Ru!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! Ru!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Ru!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Cute tail I got here right? Ru!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do, ru~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You are too old to be mumbling? Ru?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Gravity does all the work! Ru!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do something so easy. Ru~~

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Why do you keep making me do stupid stuff like this?

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? No way!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: What are you talking about, ru?

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Same goes to you too, ru!

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Why don't you feed me instead, ru?

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: It's that time of the year again, master! Ru!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I've heard that too often from Santa. Pssh.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: No, I don’t have presents for you.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: Merry Christmas to you too! Where are my presents?

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: Tell me I'm the best thing you have on Christmas!

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Ho ho ho, Meeerry Christmas! Did I sound like Santa?

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: May all your wishes come true, master!

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: Ok, please stop this whining, ru!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: This is not a soap opera, ru?

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: Maybe it's time for you to make friends, ru?

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: Well that wasn't hard to tell, ru?

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: No you aren't, because I'm here! Ru!

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: That's because you've been bad this year!

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: It must be the snow. You're depressing me, master.

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Well, first you need to feed me, then MAYBE I'll listen.

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Do you need help? You can talk to me, master.

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Here, if only I can give you a pat on the back.

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Hey, it's going to get better, okay?

string.name: c38_f1
string.value: I don’t feel like going, ru.

string.name: c38_f3
string.value: Do I really have go, ru?

string.name: c38_f4
string.value: Nah ah! I'm not going anywhere. Ru.

string.name: c38_s1
string.value: Hey, I'm ready to go! Ru!

string.name: c38_s2
string.value: See my nose lighting up? I'm excited! Ru!!

string.name: c38_s3
string.value: I can't wait to go, master! Ru!!

string.name: c38_s4
string.value: All set, ready to take off, ru!

string.name: c39_f1
string.value: Don't mush me, I'm not a dog!

string.name: c39_f4
string.value: Well, YOU can go to the pet store and buy ME some food!

string.name: c39_s4
string.value: This is exciting, we should go right now!!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You try sitting for a living!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: If mama could see me now. Ru ~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Only because you asked me to. Ru.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I hope I get a treat for this. Ru ~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You say sit. I say how long. Ru ~

string.value: Wow, someone doesn't like me. Ru!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything! WHAT, ru!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don’t make that scary face. Ru.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll try to be better. Ru.

string.value: Master! You don't understand my heart, ru ~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? Ru!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey, I followed all your orders, ru!

string.value: I was just sitting there, ru!

string.value: Did I do something wrong, again?

string.value: OK you're mad at me cuz you're bored.
